item.title: ADNOC 在美国的投资转移至国际分支 XRG
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（ADNOC）首席执行官周二表示，阿布扎比国家石油公司在美国的投资目前归属于其新成立的国际投资部门XRG，该石油巨头正着手建立以低碳能源和化学品为重点的业务。【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Company's investments in the United States now sit within its new international investment arm XRG, ADNOC's CEO said on Tuesday, as the oil giant moves to build up a business focused on lower carbon energy and chemicals.】

item.title: 美国 12 月份工厂订单再次下降
item.description: 受民用飞机预订量下降的影响，12 月份美国制成品的新订单有所下降，但其他地区的需求略显坚挺。【原文：New orders for U.S.-manufactured goods dropped in December, pulled down by a decline in bookings for civilian aircraft, but demand elsewhere was marginally firm.】

item.title: 美国 12 月职位空缺大幅下降；裁员人数较少
item.description: 美国 12 月份的职位空缺急剧下降，但低裁员率表明劳动力市场并未突然放缓。【原文：U.S. job openings dropped sharply in December, but low layoffs suggested that the labor market was not abruptly slowing down.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税威胁笼罩着年轻的阿尔诺修复 LVMH 饮料部门的使命
item.description: 就在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）面临发动贸易战的风险之际，亚历山大-阿尔诺（Alexandre Arnault）将在 LVMH 集团价值 60 亿美元的葡萄酒和烈酒业务中担任重要角色，这将使其扭亏为盈的努力变得更加复杂，而这可能决定这位 32 岁的年轻人在其父亲的帝国中的未来。【原文：Alexandre Arnault is taking a key role at LVMH's $6 billion wine and spirits business just as U.S. President Donald Trump risks unleashing a trade war, complicating a turnaround effort that could decide the 32-year-old's future in his father's empire.】

item.title: 全球股市和货币在关税风暴后的平静中找到立足点
item.description: 尽管美国和中国在关税问题上针锋相对，但在墨西哥和加拿大赢得最后一刻的缓和之后，周二股市和货币持稳，市场呈现出令人不安的平静。【原文：Stocks and currencies held steady on Tuesday as an uneasy calm settled on markets despite the United States and China going tit-for-tat on tariffs, a day after Mexico and Canada won a last-minute reprieve.】

item.title: 独家报道英国石油公司准备向伊拉克基尔库克油气田投资 250 亿美元
item.description: 一位伊拉克高级石油官员告诉路透社记者，石油巨头英国石油公司（BP）预计将在基尔库克四个油气田重建项目的整个生命周期内花费高达 250 亿美元，因为巴格达正在努力争取外国投资。【原文：Oil major BP is expected to spend up to $25 billion over the lifetime of a project to redevelop four Kirkuk oil and gas fields, a senior Iraqi oil official told Reuters, as Baghdad seeks to win back foreign investment.】

item.title: 美国关闭贸易漏洞，Shein、Temu、Amazon Haul 将涨价
item.description: 分析师和行业专家说，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本周关闭了一个用于从中国免税运输低价值包裹的贸易漏洞之后，美国购物者的运费价格可能会上涨。【原文：Shein, Temu and Amazon Haul prices are likely to rise for American shoppers, analysts and industry experts said, after U.S. President Donald Trump this week shut a trade loophole that has been used to ship low-value packages duty-free from China.】

item.title: Calvin Klein母公司PVH和Illumina股价下跌，因中国将其列为目标公司
item.description: 卡尔文-克莱恩（Calvin Klein）的所有者PVH公司和基因检测公司Illumina的股价周二在美国股市盘前交易中下跌，原因是中国将这两家公司列入了 "不可靠实体 "名单，使它们有资格受到制裁。【原文：Shares of Calvin Klein-owner PVH Corp and genetic testing company Illumina fell in U.S. premarket trading on Tuesday after China placed the two companies on its "unreliable entity" list, making them eligible for sanctions.】

item.title: 发电需求强劲，康明斯季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 美国卡车发动机制造商康明斯公司（Cummins Inc）周二公布的第四季度营收和利润均高于华尔街预期，原因是市场对其发电产品的需求强劲，该公司股价在收盘前上涨了 3.5%。【原文：U.S. truck engine maker Cummins Inc on Tuesday reported fourth-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on strong demand for its power generation products, sending the company's shares up 3.5% before the bell.】

item.title: 由于压榨利润疲软，ADM 季度利润下降，并宣布裁员
item.description: 周二，谷物商阿彻-丹尼尔斯-米德兰公司（Archer-Daniels-Midland）报告称，受油菜籽压榨利润疲软和美国生物燃料政策不确定性的影响，公司第四季度利润下降，并表示今年将在全球范围内裁员多达 700 人。【原文：Grains merchant Archer-Daniels-Midland reported a drop in fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, pressured by weak oilseed crush margins and uncertainty over U.S. biofuel policy, and said it would be laying off up to 700 employees globally this year.】

item.title: 西屋着眼于在意大利建造小型反应堆的旧核电厂址
item.description: 美国能源集团西屋公司（Westinghouse）的一位官员周二表示，该公司提议利用意大利退役的核设施来安装小型模块化反应堆，目标是在 2030 年之前开工建设。【原文：U.S. energy group Westinghouse proposed using decommissioned nuclear sites in Italy for the installation of small modular reactors, with the aim to start construction by 2030, a company official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 由于成本降低，制罐商波尔公司的季度利润超出预期
item.description: 生产铝制饮料罐的波尔公司（Ball Corp）周二公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是其成本削减措施有助于应对疲软的需求。【原文：Ball Corp , which makes aluminum beverage cans, beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday as its cost-cutting measures helped counter weak demand.】

item.title: 因湿疹药物需求，Regeneron 季度业绩超出预期；推出分红计划
item.description: 本周二，Regeneron 制药公司因其湿疹治疗药物 Dupixent 的持续需求，第四季度销售额和利润超出预期，并宣布了一项股息和股票回购计划，使其股价盘前上涨了 2.2%。【原文：Regeneron Pharmaceuticals beat fourth-quarter sales and profit estimates on Tuesday, on continuing demand for its eczema treatment, Dupixent, and announced a dividend and stock buyback program, sending its shares up 2.2% premarket.】

item.title: 政治广告支出增加，福克斯公司业绩超出预期
item.description: 周二，福克斯公司的季度收入和利润超出预期，主要原因是其新闻网络的政治广告增加，以及其 Tubi 流媒体服务的广告增加。【原文：Fox Corp surpassed quarterly revenue and profit expectations on Tuesday, driven by higher political advertising on its news network and an uptick in commercials on its Tubi streaming service.】

item.title: 特朗普关税只会让遭受重创的日产汽车雪上加霜
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能对墨西哥和加拿大征收关税的最大受害者之一，很可能是最不能承受这种痛苦的日本汽车制造商：日产汽车。【原文：One of the biggest casualties of Donald Trump's potential tariffs on Mexico and Canada is likely to be the Japanese automaker that can least afford the pain: Nissan .】

item.title: PayPal预计2025年利润高于预期，扭亏为盈成效显著
item.description: 周二，PayPal 预测全年利润将高于预期，这主要得益于公司推动品牌产品恢复增长、改善定价和加大成本削减力度。【原文：PayPal forecast full-year profit above estimates on Tuesday, fueled by a push to revive growth in branded products, improve pricing and sharpen cost-cutting efforts.】

item.title: 产品需求强劲，保险经纪公司 WTW 第四季度利润超预期
item.description: 受风险和经纪业务强劲表现的推动，保险经纪公司韦莱韬悦周二公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：Insurance broker Willis Towers Watson beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, driven by a strong performance in its risk and brokerage business.】

item.title: 交易复苏，KKR 季度利润超预期
item.description: 另类资产管理公司 KKR & Co 周二公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是交易活动的反弹提高了资产销售收入。【原文：Alternative asset manager KKR & Co reported a fourth-quarter profit that beat Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, as a rebound in dealmaking activity boosted its income from asset sales.】

item.title: 欧盟希望美国尽早举行会谈以避免特朗普加征关税
item.description: 欧盟贸易负责人马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）周二表示，欧盟希望就美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划征收的关税与美国迅速接触，而他的上司乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）则强调，欧盟将在谈判中保护自己的利益。【原文：The European Union wants to engage swiftly with the United States over President Donald Trump's planned tariffs, trade chief Maros Sefcovic said on Tuesday, while his boss Ursula von der Leyen stressed the bloc would protect its interests in negotiations.】

item.title: 辉瑞因心脏病药物和 COVID 疫苗销售而实现超预期利润
item.description: 美国制药商辉瑞公司周二公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于其心脏病药物的强劲销售，以及 COVID 疫苗销售的降幅小于预期。【原文：U.S. drugmaker Pfizer beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by strong sales of its heart disease drug and a smaller-than-feared drop in COVID vaccine sales.】

item.title: 法拉利继 2024 年业绩超过预期后，今年有望实现进一步增长
item.description: 豪华跑车制造商法拉利（Ferrari）周二表示，在强劲的产品交付和对汽车个性化装饰需求的支撑下，今年的收入和核心盈利将至少增长 5%，并已达到 2024 年的目标。【原文：Luxury sports car maker Ferrari said on Tuesday its revenue and core earnings would rise by at least 5% this year, supported by strong product delivery and demand for personal touches to its vehicles, having met targets for 2024.】

item.title: 资产激增，阿波罗全球公司第四季度利润超预期
item.description: 本周二，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）第四季度利润超出预期，主要得益于费用的强劲增长和退休业务的稳健表现。【原文：Apollo Global Management's fourth-quarter profit exceeded expectations on Tuesday, helped by a strong growth in fees and solid performance in its retirement business.】

item.title: 马拉松石油公司中游业务强劲，第四季度利润超出预期
item.description: 本周二，美国顶级炼油商马拉松石油公司（Marathon Petroleum）第四季度利润超出预期，原因是其中游业务和可再生柴油业务的强劲表现帮助抵消了炼油利润率的下滑。【原文：Top U.S. refiner Marathon Petroleum beat fourth-quarter profit estimates on Tuesday, as strength in its midstream and renewable diesel segment helped offset a slump in refining margins.】

item.title: 默克暂停加卫苗在华发货，2025 年前景受挫
item.description: 默克公司表示将暂停加卫苗在中国的发货，至少到今年年中，因为中国市场对 HPV 疫苗的需求持续疲软，预计将损害 2025 年的收入，但默克公司第四季度因销售抗癌药物 Keytruda 而实现了强劲的盈利。【原文：Merck said it will pause shipments of Gardasil to China through at least mid-year, as continued weak demand for the HPV vaccine there is expected to hurt 2025 revenue, but it still posted a strong fourth-quarter profit on sales of cancer drug Keytruda.】

item.title: 企业采用人工智能，收入前景乐观，Palantir 股价大涨
item.description: Palantir 在盘前交易中股价大涨超过 18%，此前该公司预测全年营收乐观，原因是企业对其软件和数据分析服务的需求强劲，竞相采用生成式人工智能。【原文：Palantir shares rallied over 18% in premarket trading after it forecast upbeat annual revenue fueled by strong demand for its software and data analytics services from businesses racing to adopt generative AI.】

item.title: 雅诗兰黛扩大重组计划，裁员 7000 人，销售额实现增长
item.description: 雅诗兰黛（Estee Lauder）周二扩大了其重组计划，其中包括裁员多达 7000 人，并公布第二季度销售额降幅小于预期。【原文：Estee Lauder on Tuesday expanded its restructuring plan that would include up to 7,000 job cuts and posted smaller-than-expected drop in second-quarter sales.】

item.title: 网络安全公司 SailPoint 在美国首次公开募股中寻求高达 115 亿美元的估值
item.description: 网络安全公司 SailPoint 周二表示，其在美国首次公开募股的目标估值高达 115 亿美元。【原文：Cybersecurity firm SailPoint said on Tuesday it was targeting a valuation of up to $11.5 billion in its initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 特朗普关税大戏对美国汽车制造商和汽车买家都有重大影响
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）让一些全球最大的汽车制造商猜测，美国总统是否会兑现威胁，对他们的汽车和供应链征收进口税，这可能会导致美国消费者的汽车价格大幅上涨。【原文：Donald Trump is keeping some of the world’s biggest automakers guessing whether the U.S. president will follow through on threats to slap their vehicles and supply chains with import taxes that could cause hefty vehicle-price spikes for U.S. consumers.】

item.title: 由于苏打水和零食需求疲软，百事公司预计年度利润低于预期
item.description: 周二，百事可乐公司（Pepsico）预计全年利润低于预期，季度收入不及预期，原因是该公司最大的市场美国对其汽水和零食的需求减弱。【原文：Pepsico forecast annual profit below expectations and missed quarterly revenue estimates on Tuesday, as the Frito-Lay maker faces weakening demand for its sodas and snacks in the U.S., its largest market.】

item.title: 早间新闻：特朗普关税 "魅影 "在中国愈发真实
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】
